trans-unit.target: Retorna uma notificação dos eventos <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized" /> ou <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized" />.

trans-unit.source: This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from application code.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe dá suporte à infraestrutura do .NET Framework e não se destina a ser usada diretamente do código do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: A `SpeechHypothesized` event is raised by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: Um `SpeechHypothesized` é gerado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain detailed information about a tentatively recognized phrase by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter informações detalhadas sobre uma frase reconhecida provisoriamente usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Numerous `SpeechHypothesized` events are generated as a recognition engine attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Vários `SpeechHypothesized` eventos são gerados como um reconhecimento mecanismo tenta identificar uma frase de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, manipular esses eventos só é útil para depuração.

trans-unit.source: The example below creates a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> events.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um manipulador para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The handler uses an instance of `SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs` to return and display information about a tentatively recognized phrase.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador utiliza uma instância de `SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs` para retornar e exibir informações sobre uma frase provisoriamente reconhecida.
